message.raw:
Revised installation script with the following changes:
  Fixed bug that allowed spaces in paths.
  Installed HDF5 version 1.8.2->1.8.4
  Explicit PyTables installer (rather than just using setup.py 'requires')
    to make sure it is installed **before** the program of interest.
    This will be more important once we upgrade to PyTables 2.2, since
    that version has dependencies that aren't listed in its setup.py,
    and thus must be managed separately (Cython, numexpr, numpy).
  Changed check_version() interface.
  Updated the way versions are extracted from URLs, to allow hyphens in the
    version number (rather than in the program name, as was previously the case)
message.html:
Revised installation script with the following changes:
Fixed bug that allowed spaces in paths.
Installed HDF5 version 1.8.2->1.8.4
Explicit PyTables installer (rather than just using setup.py 'requires')
to make sure it is installed before the program of interest.
This will be more important once we upgrade to PyTables 2.2, since
that version has dependencies that aren't listed in its setup.py,
and thus must be managed separately (Cython, numexpr, numpy).
Changed check_version() interface.
Updated the way versions are extracted from URLs, to allow hyphens in the
version number (rather than in the program name, as was previously the case)

message:
Revised installation script with the following changes:
  Fixed bug that allowed spaces in paths.
  Installed HDF5 version 1.8.2->1.8.4
  Explicit PyTables installer (rather than just using setup.py 'requires')
    to make sure it is installed **before** the program of interest.
    This will be more important once we upgrade to PyTables 2.2, since
    that version has dependencies that aren't listed in its setup.py,
    and thus must be managed separately (Cython, numexpr, numpy).
  Changed check_version() interface.
  Updated the way versions are extracted from URLs, to allow hyphens in the
    version number (rather than in the program name, as was previously the case)
